species.name: Hutt
species.description: As they age, Hutts continue to grow larger and, if wealthy and powerful, more corpulent. Since Hutts can live for over one thousand years, the oldest and most powerful Hutts are very massive indeed. Even a comparatively toung and vigorous Hutt has a flexible, muscular torso some two or three meters in length, topped by a broad head with two enormous eyes and a cavernous mouth. Compared to the rest of their bodies, Hutt arms seem stuggy and short, although they are still powerful in their own right.
species.startSkills: Begin with 1 rank in Coercion or Discipline, 1 rank in the Enduring talent, and 1 rank in the Nobody's Fool talent.
species.specialAbilities: Can never spend moe than 1 maneuver moving per turn.
